Uses of Package
io.dropwizard.testing.junit

  • Packages that use io.dropwizard.testing.junit 
    Package Description
    io.dropwizard.testing.junit  
  • Classes in io.dropwizard.testing.junit used by io.dropwizard.testing.junit 
    Class and Description
    DAOTestRule
    A JUnit rule for testing DAOs and Hibernate entities.
    DAOTestRule.Builder 
    DropwizardAppRule
    A JUnit rule for starting and stopping your application at the start and end of a test class.
    DropwizardAppRule.ServiceListener 
    ResourceTestRule
    A JUnit TestRule for testing Jersey resources.
    ResourceTestRule.Builder
    A ResourceTestRule builder which enables configuration of a Jersey testing environment.
